title: Name The Best Grand Theft Auto Game - Game Showdown
description:
Pre-Order Final Fantasy VII Rebirth here! https://bit.ly/FF7R_KindaFunny

Go to http://factormeals.com/kindafunny50 and use code kindafunny50 to get 50% off

What did our audience decide as the best GTA game? Can Mike redeem himself for Team Greg? Let's find out on today's Game Showdown.

Season 1 Ep .6

Pre-Order Final Fantasy VII Rebirth here! https://bit.ly/FF7R_KindaFunny

Go to http://factormeals.com/kindafunny50 and use code kindafunny50 to get 50% off
